conversation.speaker: Player
conversation.text: The Forgotten Flower... It's even more magnificent than I imagined. Its petals shimmer with the essence of every color imaginable. This must be the key to restoring the forest's magic.

conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text: The creatures and I place our trust in you. Channel the magic within you and let it flow through the petals of the Forgotten Flower. Paint the world with color once more and bring back the harmony we lost.

conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text: The magic stirs once again! I can feel it returning! You are doing it, my chosen one. The forest's heart beats with color anew. Thank you, hero.

conversation.speaker: Player
conversation.text: No worries. It is my duty to bring peace to the world.

conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text: Our forest thanks you for that. Now, let me bring you to the Whispering Glen, where our melodies were stolen away.
